entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
